 2. To further the declared purpose of this article, the board shall
have the following functions, powers and duties:
To formulate over-all policy in the state's programs for\nregulating the use, transportation, storage and disposal of pesticides.\n
To coordinate the activities and programs of member departments\nconcerned with the use and effects of pesticides.\n
To cause such studies, research and investigations to be made as\nit may deem advisable and necessary.\n
To collect and compile information and data relating to the use\nand effects of pesticides.\n
To advise and assist state departments and agencies upon request.\n
To inform the public concerning the state's efforts to regulate\nthe use of pesticides and to provide information concerning pesticides.\n
To recommend that the use of specific pesticides be prohibited\nunder specified conditions.\n

To consult and cooperate with the appropriate agencies of the
federal government or of other states to more effectively carry out its
functions, powers and duties hereunder.
To do all things necessary or reasonable to carry out the\nforegoing functions, powers and duties.\n
